title: Pakistan strongly condemns Houthi attacks targeting Saudi airbase
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 29 (APP): Pakistan on Saturday strongly condemned attacks of bomb-laden UAVs launched towards King Khalid Airbase in Saudi Arabia by Houthi militia.
“Commendable that coalition forces intercepted and destroyed all of them. Such attacks seeking to cause fear and terror are reprehensible,” Foreign Office spokesperson said in a statement.
We strongly condemn attacks of bomb-laden UAVs launched towards King Khalid Air Base in Kingdom of Saudi Arabia by #Houthi militia. Commendable that coalition forces intercepted & destroyed all of them. Such attacks seeking to cause fear & terror are reprehensible.1/2@KSAmofaEN
— Spokesperson  MoFA (@ForeignOfficePk) May 29, 2021
Pakistan reaffirms its full support and solidarity with the brotherly Kingdom of Saudi Arabia against any threat to its security and territorial integrity, he added.
